### setOutputDWARFHandler() {#a496b5d31b33d7423bc5c28fd29d57a94}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::dwarf&#95;linker::parallel::DWARFLinker::setOutputDWARFHandler (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple">Triple</a> &amp; TargetTriple, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/#a6f049fdf3c9f69b0817f13b00ce1140a">SectionHandlerTy</a> SectionHandler)</>}>
Set output DWARF handler.

Result of linking DWARF is set of sections containing final debug info. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/dwarflinkerbase/#a5c06ee4a3b2d38bf3fc825fc74580383">DWARFLinkerBase::link()</a> pass generated sections using specified <code>SectionHandler</code>.
